flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
音を　立てず　滑る　ように　滑空する。
両腕の　大きな　ツメと　足の　ツメで
獲物の　顔に　しが つき　毒針を　刺す。

Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were
sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using
its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then
injects the prey with its poison barb.

Gligar fende l’aria impercettibilmente come se stesse
scivolando. Questo Pokémon si aggrappa al viso del nemico
usando le zampe posteriori artigliate e le possenti chele
sulle zampe anteriori, poi avvelena la preda con il suo aculeo.

Gligar planea por el aire sin hacer ningún ruido, como si fuera
patinando. Este Pokémon se agarra a la cara de su rival con
las patas traseras, con forma de garra, y las pinzas de las
delanteras y le inyecta veneno por el aguijón.

Skorgla segelt lautlos durch die Lüfte. Es verankert sich
mithilfe der Krallen an seinen Hinterbeinen und der riesigen
Scheren an seinen Vorderbeinen am Gesicht eines Feindes
und vergiftet ihn mit seinem Giftstachel.

Scorplane plane dans les airs sans un bruit, comme s’il glissait.
Ce Pokémon s’accroche au visage de son ennemi grâce aux
serres de ses pattes arrière et aux pinces de ses pattes avant,
et pique avec son dard empoisonné.

소리 내지 않고 미끄러지듯 활공한다.
양손의 커다란 손톱과 발의 발톱으로
먹이의 얼굴에 달라붙어 독침을 찌른다.

おとを　たてず　すべる　ように　かっくうする。
りょううでの　おおきな　ツメと　あしの　ツメで
えものの　かおに　しが つき　どくばりを　さす。

両腕の　大きな　ツメと　足の　ツメで
獲物の　顔に　しが つき　毒針を　刺す。

Skorgla segelt lautlos durch die Lüfte. Es verankert sich
mithilfe der Krallen an seinen Hinterbeinen und der riesigen
Scheren an seinen Vorderbeinen am Gesicht eines Feindes
und vergiftet ihn mit seinem Giftstachel.

Scorplane plane dans les airs sans un bruit, comme s’il glissait.
Ce Pokémon s’accroche au visage de son ennemi grâce aux
serres de ses pattes arrière et aux pinces de ses pattes avant,
et pique avec son dard empoisonné.

소리 내지 않고 미끄러지듯 활공한다.
양손의 커다란 손톱과 발의 발톱으로
먹이의 얼굴에 달라붙어 독침을 찌른다.

おとを　たてず　すべる　ように　かっくうする。
りょううでの　おおきな　ツメと　あしの　ツメで
えものの　かおに　しが つき　どくばりを　さす。

顔面　めがけて　飛んでくる。
張りつかれた　獲物が　驚く
あいだに　毒針を　刺しこむ。

It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps
down on the startled victim to inject poison.

Vola in picchiata sulla testa del nemico, lo atterra e
gli inietta il suo veleno.

Vuela directo a la cara del objetivo y acaba con su
aterrada víctima inyectándole veneno.

Es fliegt direkt auf das Gesicht seiner Feinde zu
und injiziert ihnen eine Überdosis Gift.

Il vole droit vers le visage de sa cible effrayée et s’y
accroche pour lui injecter son poison.

얼굴을 겨냥하고 날아와
들러붙어 먹이가 놀라는
사이에 독침을 찌른다.

がんめん　めがけて　とんでくる。
はりつかれた　えものが　おどろく
あいだに　どくばりを　さしこむ。

いつもは　崖に　張りついている。
獲物を見つけると　羽を広げ
風に乗り　襲いかかってくる。

It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,
it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

Di solito sta attaccato agli scogli. Attacca la preda
spalancando le ali e planando.

A veces se sujeta a los precipicios. Cuando divisa una
presa, despliega sus alas y planea para atacar.

Es hängt meist an Klippen. Erspäht es Beute,
spreizt es seine Flügel und greift diese sofort an.

Il s’accroche souvent aux falaises. Sa proie repérée,
il plane vers elle pour l’attaquer.

보통은 벼랑에 붙어 있다.
먹이를 발견하면 날개를 펼쳐
바람을 타고 날아 덮친다.

いつもは　がけに　はりついている。
えものをみつけると　はねをひろげ
かぜにのり　おそいかかってくる。

It clamps on to its chosen prey then
jabs the stinger on its tail into the
prey while it’s stunned with surprise.

It clamps on to its chosen prey then
jabs the stinger on its tail into the
prey while it’s stunned with surprise.

It glides as if sliding. It startles
foes by clamping on to their faces,
then jabs with its poison stinger.

Il fend l’air et fond sur sa proie
pour s’agripper à son visage et
la frapper avec son dard.

foes by clamping on to their faces,
then jabs with its poison stinger.

Il fend l’air et fond sur sa proie
pour s’agripper à son visage et
la frapper avec son dard.

and glides down to attack.

It glides as if sliding. It startles
foes by clamping on to their faces,
then jabs with its poison stinger.

It sails on the winds with its
limbs extended to strike from the
sky. It aims for the prey’s face.

limbs extended to strike from the
sky. It aims for the prey’s face.

It flies straight at its target’s face,
then clamps down on the startled

It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots
its prey, it spreads its wings and glides
down to attack.

It glides without making a single sound.
It grasps the face of its foe using its
hind and large front claws, then stabs
with its poison barb.

GLIGAR glides through the air without
a sound as if it were sliding.
This POKéMON hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and
the large pincers on its forelegs, then
injects the prey with its poison barb.

a sound as if it were sliding.
This POKéMON hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and
the large pincers on its forelegs, then
injects the prey with its poison barb.

It builds its nest
on a steep cliff.
When it is done gliding, it hops
along the ground
back to its nest.

to cliffs. When it
spots its prey, it spreads its wings
and glides down to
attack.

It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.
